info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 11:12AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Salt Lake and east central Tooele Counties through 1145 AM MDT... At 1111 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grantsville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Valley City, Tooele, Grantsville, West Jordan, South Jordan, Stansbury Park, Tooele Army Depot, Bingham Canyon Mine, Magna, Copperton, Lake Point and Erda. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 90 and 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
